## Practical exercises {.unnumbered}

This hands-on workbook has been designed to help you put key PhEpi concepts and methods into practice. This workbook supports the material taught in the pharmacoepidemiology course and provides a practical application framework for understanding the topics covered in lectures. The exercises bridge the gap between theory and practice, offering guided opportunities for deepening comprehension.
